title: mvn test fails since 3.0.0.Alpha6 and custom junit-platform.properties
body:
### Describe the bug
Implemented a junit-platform.properties to set class order in 3.0.0.Alpha5.  Running: mvn test produces a warning of duplicate properties file.  According to Quarkus docs, the pom.xml junit dependency should be updated to exclude the built in junit-platform.properties and add your own junit-platform.properties in test/resources folder.

After migrating to 3.0.0.Alpha6, error is thrown in regards to not class not found for IntegrationTestUtil.  Error is thrown whether or not the exclusion is in the pom.

### Expected behavior

be able to use custom junit-platform.properties

### Actual behavior
1. without exclusions in pom, duplicate properties is still thrown, but error is thrown
2. adding exclusion in pom.xml, error is still thrown but warning is gone

### java.lang.RuntimeException: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Could not initialize class io.quarkus.test.junit.IntegrationTestUtil

``

### How to Reproduce?

1. Download a generic 3.0.0.Alpha6 starter project with rest easy reactive.

3. Configure JUnit dependency with exclusion as follows:

```xml
<dependency>
      <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
      <artifactId>quarkus-junit5</artifactId>
      <scope>test</scope>
      <exclusions>
        <exclusion>
          <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
          <artifactId>quarkus-junit5-properties</artifactId>
        </exclusion>
      </exclusions>
    </dependency>
```

4. Add a junit-platorm.properties file in: test/resources folder
5. run: mvn test
6. this produces the error of no class found

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

jeffrogers@MacBook-Air ~ % uname -a Darwin MacBook-Air.local 20.6.0 Darwin Kernel Version 20.6.0: Thu Sep 29 20:15:11 PDT 2022; root:xnu-7195.141.42~1/RELEASE_X86_64 x86_64

Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment 18.9 (build 11.0.17+10-LTS-269)
Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM 18.9 (build 11.0.17+10-LTS-269, mixed mode)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.0.0.Alpha6

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.8.1 (05c21c65bdfed0f71a2f2ada8b84da59348c4c5d)

Default locale: en_US, platform encoding: UTF-8
OS name: "mac os x", version: "11.7.1", arch: "x86_64", family: "mac"


### Additional information
See attached reproducer
